mainText: I just wanted to say thank you to Steve Jobs for everything he did to revolutionize the computer/tablet and smartphone industry......nothing will ever compare to your creative genius and the world is a much duller place now that you're gone! Thank god we still have the iPad2 to keep a smile on our faces on this very sad day.  Rest in Peace Steve, you will be missed more than you would've ever realized!
author: Kristy
